name: SantaClausQuiz
0:
”Alexa, start Santa Claus Quiz.”
”Start new game.”
”Repeat the question.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa claus quiz
des: Both young and old can test their knowledge of Santa in this exciting Alexa quiz game! Your knowledge of the famous gift giver will be put to the ultimate test, with both easy and challenging questions for the entire family to enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
